BRING STORIES LIKE THIS THAT ARE

WHO IS VERY NEW,
BUT AN OLD SOUL

AND YES HIS GRANDFATHER IS
BOB MARLEY

BUT BESIDES THAT AMAZING
FACTOID

THAT WAS SOUNDING AMAZING SO I
ASKED TO HEAR THE SONG
AND IT WAS SKIP'S NEW SONG LION

WHICH IS OUT NOW AND IT WAS SO

UP AND COMING

AND YOU HAVE TO CHECK IT OUT

SUPER STRONG RISE AND GO STRONG

THIS HAS BEEN A VERY GOOD
